trans-unit.source: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kontroll som genererer en liste med elementer i et punktmerket format.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the BulletedList control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#Introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduksjon Bruk BulletedList kontrollen til å opprette en liste med elementer som er formatert med punkt.

trans-unit.source: To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a BulletedList control, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi individuelle elementene som skal vises i en BulletedList kontroll, kan du plassere et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekt for hver oppføring mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens BulletedList.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a BulletedList control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Du angir punkttype skal brukes til å vise listen over elementer i en BulletedList-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>egenskapen til en av typene som punkt som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available bullet styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelig punktstiler.

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: | Punktstil | Beskrivelse | |------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Ikke angitt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et tall. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Liten bokstav. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En stor bokstav. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En liten latinske numerisk. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et tall med store latinske. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En sirkel. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En tom sirkel. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En fylt firkantet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et egendefinert bilde. | Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>til å angi verdien som starter nummerering av elementene i en bestilte BulletedList-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> field.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>egenskapen ignoreres hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property also to specify the location of the image file.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>for å angi en egendefinert bildet for punktet, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>også til å angi plasseringen av bildefilen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the display behavior of the list items in a BulletedList, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property to one of the values that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For å angi virkemåten for visning av elementene i en BulletedList, angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>til en av verdiene som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defined display behaviors are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Definerte Vis virkemåter er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker en hyperkobling, går det til en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>til å angi URL-adressen som en hyperkobling navigerer til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A> property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>til å angi rammen eller vindu som viser websiden navigeres til når du klikker en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, the BulletedList control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, viser BulletedList kontrollen listeelementer som koblinger post-på serveren når du klikker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil kontrollere handlingene som utføres når brukeren klikker en kobling-knapp programmatisk, kan du angi en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> properties are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and are not applicable to the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A>Egenskaper er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klasse og gjelder ikke for kontrollen BulletedList.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a BulletedList that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>klassen for å finne ut indeksen for knappen kobling i en BulletedList som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The BulletedList control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen BulletedList støtter også databinding.

trans-unit.source: To bind the BulletedList to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: For å binde BulletedList til en datakilde, kan du bruke de angitte mekanismene for databinding.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet markup gjengis som standard for denne kontrollen, kan ikke med kravene for tilgjengelighet standarder som Web innhold tilgjengelighet retningslinjene 1.0 (WCAG) prioritet 1 retningslinjene.

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om tilgjengelighet støtte for denne kontrollen, kan du se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the BulletedList constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BulletedList konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control to render to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til HTML-attributter og stiler en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen skal gjengi til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used primarily by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles into the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> output stream for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAttributesToRender brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere å sette inn riktig attributtene og stiler i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>utdata dataflyten for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*> property for the base class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*>egenskapen for base klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack*>

trans-unit.source: The AutoPostBack property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AutoPostBack er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klasse og gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: Do not assign a value to the AutoPostBack property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke tilordne en verdi til egenskapen AutoPostBack.

trans-unit.source: If you do assign a value to the AutoPostBack, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tilordner en verdi til AutoPostBack, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value to the AutoPostBack.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å tilordne en verdi til AutoPostBack.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for each bullet in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til et bilde som skal vises for hvert punkt i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The path to an image to display as each bullet in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Banen til et bilde som skal vises som hver punktet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bullet style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Punktstil for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>til å angi Punktstil å listeelementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>egenskapen er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulige verdier.

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet.
trans-unit.target: | Punktstil | Beskrivelse | |------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Ikke angitt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et tall. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Liten bokstav. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En stor bokstav. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En liten latinske numerisk. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et tall med store latinske. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En sirkel. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En tom sirkel. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| En fylt firkantet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>| Et egendefinert bilde. | Angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>verdien lar deg angi ditt eget bilde for punktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property to the URL of the custom image to use.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>verdi, må du også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>URL-adresse for den egendefinerte avbildningen å bruke egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control does not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>egenskapen fordi punktene er arvbart dekorative og gir ikke vil ha mer informasjon som skal være formidles via hjelpefunksjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en egendefinert avbildning for å formidle et begrep for brukeren, må du imidlertid legge til ekstra tekst hver punktlisteelementene eller bruke en kontroll som lar deg angi alternativ tekst for hvert bilde.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a link button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kobling-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when a list item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Klikk denne hendelsen oppstår når et listeelement i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: To enable list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control to raise the Click event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property first must be set to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Aktivere listeelementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll opphøye Click-hendelsen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>egenskapen først må angis som verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> samling for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Controls property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kontroller er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>klasse og gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The Controls collection is overridden from the base class to always return the <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollsamlingen overstyres fra basisklasse til alltid å gi det <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: A control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: En kontrollsamling for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display mode of the list content in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir mellom visning av listen innhold i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DisplayMode property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DisplayMode-egenskapen til å angi virkemåten for visning skal brukes til innholdet i listeelementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The DisplayMode property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: DisplayMode-egenskapen er satt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulige verdier.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Hyperlinks.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Link buttons.| The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Vises som | |-----------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>| Tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>| Hyperkoblinger. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>| Koble knappene. | Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>verdi, kan du vise listen over innhold som hyperkoblinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Når du klikker, navigerer en hyperkobling til en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>til å angi URL-adressen som en hyperkobling navigerer til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> field allows you to display list content as links.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>feltet kan du vise listen over innhold som koblinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event to post back to the server when a link button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelsen for å legge inn på serveren når en kobling-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som starter nummerering av elementene i en bestilte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstBulletNumber property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FirstBulletNumber-egenskapen til å angi verdien som starter nummerering av elementene i en bestilte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the FirstBulletNumber property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet til FirstBulletNumber-egenskapen ignoreres hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>verdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the FirstBulletNumber property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number.
trans-unit.target: Selv om verdien for egenskapen FirstBulletNumber er et heltall, den fører ikke alltid til et punkt skal gjengis som et tall.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the FirstBulletNumber property to `4` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter FirstBulletNumber-egenskapen til for eksempel `4` og angi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>egenskapen verdi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>vil føre til at det første punkt tallet som en liten d.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som starter nummerering av elementene i en bestilte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is `1`.
trans-unit.target: Standard `1`.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event is raised when a list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>denne hendelsen oppstår når et listeelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: To enable list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Aktivere listeelementer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll opphøye <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>hendelsen, må du først angi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>egenskapen verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollere når et skjema posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control when a link button within the item list is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent er brukt internt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollerer når brukeren klikker en kobling-knapp i listen over elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Siden inneholdende angir indeksen for knappen klikket koblingen i den `eventArgument` parameteren som brukes til å initialisere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method raises a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event by passing the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent opphøyer et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>hendelsen ved å sende den initialisert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method optionally can perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent eventuelt kan utføre før du opprettet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>hendelsen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke validere gruppe vises på siden når en kobling-knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>klikkes, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `true` og angi gruppen for å validere i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The string representation for the index of the list item that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Strengrepresentasjon for indeksen av listeelementet som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: Skriver den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollere innholdet for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet til å kunne vises på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The Render method writes the rendered content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> items to the client using the supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse skriver gjengitte innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>elementer til klienten ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> item is represented by an element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>elementet representeres av et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is empty, no content is rendered to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>egenskapen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen er tom, ingen innhold gjengis til <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, the Render method writes the HTML content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes minst én listeelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling, metoden gjengivelse skriver HTML-innhold for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>styre ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Renders the bulleted text for each list item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser punktteksten for hvert listeelement i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The RenderBulletText method renders the bulleted text for each list item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderBulletText gjengir punktteksten for hvert listeelement i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollere parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> objekter i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> til å hente fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Output-dataflyten som gjengir HTML-innhold til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Renders the list items of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control as bullets into the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser listeelementer i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen som punkt i den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method renders the list items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control as bullets into the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjengir listeelementer til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll som punkt i den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen gjengis Hvis datakilden inneholder ingen data, eller hvis kontrollen ikke er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen gjengis Hvis datakilden har ingen data eller kontrollen ikke er bundet til data; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den nullbaserte indeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In the base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: I basisklassen, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen returnerer en nullbasert indeks for det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at ingenting er merket.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedIndex gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the SelectedIndex property, it always returns `-1`.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** når du bruker den `get` aksessor for egenskapen SelectedIndex, returneres alltid `-1`.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to use the `set` accessor for the SelectedIndex property raises a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Et forsøk på å bruke den `set` aksessor for egenskapen SelectedIndex opphøyer <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>klassen for å finne ut indeksen for knappen kobling i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke kan bindes i visual utviklere, men er kan bindes under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det valgte elementet en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In the base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object that represents the currently selected item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: I basisklassen, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A>returnerer en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objektet som representerer det valgte elementet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Standard `null`.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItem property is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedItem gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use the `get` accessor for the SelectedItem property to return the selected item for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, it always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du bruker den `get` aksessor for egenskapen SelectedItem til å returnere det valgte elementet for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollere, returneres alltid `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>klassen for å finne ut indeksen for knappen kobling i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value*> property of the selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value*>for den valgte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> objekt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValue property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedValue er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klasse og gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectedValue property is set internally based on the selected list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For SelectedValue-egenskapen er angitt internt basert på valgte listeelementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectedValue property directly, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter egenskapen SelectedValue direkte, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value*>for det valgte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>; ellers en tom streng (""), hvis ingen elementer er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value*>

trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdien for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the TagKey property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> value that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TagKey-egenskapen til å fastslå den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>verdi som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The HTML text writer tag value.
trans-unit.target: HTML writer koden tekstverdien.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målvinduet eller rammen der du vil vise nettsiden innholdet som er knyttet til når en hyperkobling i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: Verdier må begynne med en bokstav i området for A til Z (samlingstype), unntatt spesielle verdiene som er oppført i tabellen nedenfor som begynner med et understrekingstegn.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `_blank`| Gjengir innholdet i et nytt vindu uten forhandleren. | | `_parent`| Gjengir innholdet i det overordnede elementet umiddelbar ramme-sett. | | `_search`| Gjengir innholdet i ruten. | | `_self`| Gjengir innholdet i rammen med fokus. | | `_top`| Gjengir innholdet i hele vinduet uten forhandleren. | > [!NOTE] > Se i dokumentasjonen for nettleseren for å finne ut om den `_search` verdien støttes.

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 og senere støtter det `_search` målverdi.

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Target-egenskapen til å angi rammen eller vindu som viser websiden som er knyttet til når en hyperkobling i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Å vise innholdet i elementene som hyperkoblinger i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll, angir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>du verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> egenskapen</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: Then, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Angi deretter det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>for hvert listeelement til URL-adressen for Web-siden til å navigere til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Target property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Target-egenskapen ikke er angitt, oppdaterer nettleser eller vinduet med fokus når hyperkoblingen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target-egenskapen blir gjengitt som et `target` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: Den `target` attributtet for `anchor` elementer er ikke tillatt i typedefinisjonen XHTML 1.1 dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi egenskapen Target hvis den gjengitte utdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>må være XHTML 1.1 kompatible.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se emnet [XHTML standarder i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> Når du oppretter tilgjengelig nettsider, anbefales det du ikke bruke Target-egenskapen til et nytt vindu som mål.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Målvinduet eller rammen der du vil laste inn nettsiden knyttet til når en hyperkobling i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Text property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: Text-egenskapen er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klasse og gjelder ikke for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Text property is set internally based on the selected list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bruker Text-egenskapen er angitt internt basert på valgte listeelementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Text property directly, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir egenskapen Text direkte, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: While you cannot access the Text property of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, you can use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Når du ikke får tilgang til Text-egenskapen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>kontrollen, kan du bruke Hendelsesdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>klassen for å finne ut indeksen for knappen kobling i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: You can then access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Du får da tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue*> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>, if one of the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> is selected; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue*>av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>, hvis ett av elementene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> er valgte; ellers, en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value to the Text.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å tilordne en verdi til teksten.
